World.title: Want to hear about a cool job? This New Zealander plays French horn in Antarctica

World.title: 'Person of interest' detained over Brown University shooting, police say

World.title: Chileans voting for president are choosing between starkly different candidates: a lifelong communist or the far-right son of a former Nazi
World.description: Chileans head to the polls on Sunday, and an arch-conservative pledging mass migrant expulsions is strongly favored over his leftist opponent.

World.title: Al Jazeera reporter takes shelter amid shelling at Thai-Cambodia border

World.description: Donald Trump has vowed retaliation against ISIL after an ambush near Palmyra in central Syria killed three US citizens.

World.description: The truce did not address the root cause of the conflict. A new initiative with a clear enforcement mechanism is needed.

World.description: The shooting at Bondi Beach declared as a 'terrorist incident' after at least 11 people killed and 29 injured.

Politics.title: Bondi attack on Jewish community 'sickening' says Starmer

Politics.title: Week in politics: Crunch time for new health insurance plans, Trump sued over White House renovations, Americans killed by ISIS
Politics.description: Despite being in control of the White House and Congress, Republicans have been unable to pass their health care agenda. We look at why that's the case, as well as a new lawsuit against the president.

Politics.description: Specialist rape and sexual offence investigation teams will be introduced to every police force in England and Wales by 2029.

Tech.title: On online prediction markets, people place bets on the outcomes of real-life wars

Business.description: Rail operators promise more services across the network and faster journeys on some routes.

Business.description: Volunteers are preparing hampers and toys for local children who would otherwise go without.

Business.title: Supermarket skincare dupes could save you hundreds. But do budget beauty products work?

Culture.title: From asbestos to soap to paper, Hollywood has used many tricks to let it (fake) snow over the years

Culture.title: 'Songwriting is my therapy', says Tom Walker

Culture.description: Kiefer Sutherland, Michelle Pfeiffer and Kate Winslet all star in new festive films this Christmas.
